ygData.subject: RE: Don't go to Befallen at level 9!!!
ygData.msgSnippet: Kalvin Lau wrote: If train is the cause to make to hate Befallen, pls dont go there until lvl 30. I ve hunt there when I am lvl 6, and I leave there at lvl 16
ygData.messageBody:
Kalvin Lau wrote:

"If train is the cause to make to hate Befallen, pls
dont go there until lvl 30. I've hunt there when I am
lvl 6, and I leave there at lvl 16 then go to unrest.
My other Paladin char is lvl 22 and will still die in
lvl 3 if play in solo. Also, I've seem a lvl 22 char
die twice a night by elf skel, ghoul, necro train. So
if u dont want see any train, just dont go befallen
and unrest.

Saidinn responds:

Bah. Trains are a part of life in every dungeon. You just have to be
smart enough to know your level's limits, and lucky enough to live a day
longer than the next guy. The point is simple: If you want to level
quickly, don't even think about befallen until you're level is
sufficient to survive a train or two.

Saidinn Witchwood.

P.S. Frankly, I've never seen a level 6 person in Befallen. If you were
there at level six and had fun, then my hat goes off to you. Me, I'd
rather hunt in Butcherblock at that level.
